channel.title: Server not recognizing weapon[317]

item.title: Server not recognizing weapon[317]
item.dc:creator: @jaruanna jaruanna
item.description:
@jaruanna wrote:

[code]public static int getHitAnimation(final Client c, final int weapon) {
final String itemName = c.getPacketSender().getItemName(weapon);

	if (itemName.endsWith("scimitar") && c.FightType != 3) {
		return 451;
	}
	}[/code]

That is my code for combat animation for the scimitar. For some reason the server doesn’t recognize that the item name has ‘scimitar’ in it so it runs the default animation. Why is it doing this? What am I doing wrong?

Read full topic
